articles.title: Concerns mount about coronavirus spreading in hospitals, study suggests
articles.description: A new coronavirus study involving data on 138 patients hospitalized with novel coronavirus-infected pneumonia in Wuhan, China, finds that hospital-related transmissions of the virus were suspected in about 41% of those patients.
